title: BACnetObjectBase (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK PUBLIC BACnetObjectBase IMPLEMENTS
IBACnetObjectBase
Any BACnet-Object initialized or created using this library (BACnet.library) may be reflected by an FB which is derived of this FB-Type.
This FB provides easy and comfortable functionalities for accessing the BACnet-Objects properties, manipulating them and all additionally
information about the BACnet-Object (like parent BACnet-Device).
